programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Deacon Blues
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E15, Doug sees Deacon with another woman while he told Kelly he had to work late.

programme.title: Horizontal Hold
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E16, Carrie bans sex for two weeks because she's afraid she and Doug don't talk enough.

programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: S'no Job
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E23, Danny's father Stu asks Doug to arrange a job interview for Danny at IPS. Doug however doesn't want Danny to work with him.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E24, Sam expresses interest in politics when he falls for a woman running for city council.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E25, Diane quits when she finds out Sam's girlfriend wants her fired.

programme.title: Strange Bedfellows (Part 3)
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E26, Diane tries to make Sam's life miserable for pushing her out the door.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E01, It is revealed that it was Diane to whom Sam proposed on the telephone in the last episode.

programme.title: Cape Cad
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E02, Sam's date, Vicki, checks out of a country inn to visit her grandmother in the hospital.

programme.title: Money Dearest
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E03, Cliff fixes his mother, Esther, up with the wealthy Duncan Fitzgerald.

programme.title: Abnormal Psychology
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E04, Frasier appears on a television show for a debate with Dr. Lilith Stern.

programme.title: House Of Horrors With Formal Dining and Used Brick
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E05, Cliff stays the night when Carla gets spooked in her new house.

programme.title: Tan N' Wash
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E06, Norm is excited about a new business venture, a combination laundromat and tanning salon.

programme.title: Young Doctor Weinstein
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E07, Sam steals Diane's dinner reservations at a fancy restaurant.

programme.title: The Knights Of Scimitar
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E08, Diane tries to make Sam jealous by flirting with one of her students.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Orphans
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E09, The Cheers gang has a Thanksgiving feast at Carla's new house.

programme.title: Everyone Imitates Art
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E10, A magazine rejects Diane's poem and accepts Sam's writing instead.

programme.title: Book Of Samuel
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E11, Woody lies to his hometown girlfriend when she shows up with another guy.

programme.title: Dance, Diane, Dance
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E12, Diane is fooled into believing that she's a dance star waiting to happen.

programme.title: Chambers Vs. Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E13, Diane tricks Sam into proposing to her again and she accepts.

programme.title: Diamond Sam
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E14, Diane throws her engagement ring out the window when she mistakes it for a fake.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E15, Diane and Carla console Loretta, who has caught Nick cheating on her.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E16, Carla falls head over heals for hockey star Eddie LeBec, a newly acquired goalie for the Bruins.

programme.title: Never Love A Goalie (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E17, Carla realizes she's the reason Eddie's hockey game is suffering.

programme.title: One Last Fling
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E18, Diane and Sam agree to a twenty-four hour separation to purge other desires.

programme.title: Dog Bites Cliff
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E19, Cliff files a lawsuit and ends up getting blindsided by the beautiful defendant.

programme.title: Dinner At Eight-Ish
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E20, The regulars meet over dinner to discuss Frasier asking Lilith to move in.

programme.title: Simon Says
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E21, Diane and Sam are given a bleak prognosis from a noted marriage counselor.

programme.title: The Godfather (Part III)
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E22, Sam flips out when his goddaughter visits and agrees to move in with Woody.

programme.title: Norm's First Hurrah
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E23, Norm lies about the prestige of his new position at a CPA firm.

programme.title: Cheers: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E24, Woody's parents want him to move back home, but the regulars try to keep him.

programme.title: A House Is Not A Home
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E25, Sam and Diane buy a house from a couple who have been there for forty years.

programme.title: I Do, Adieu
programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Home Is The Sailor
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E01, Sam returns to Cheers after sailing around the world and wants his job back.

programme.title: "I" On Sports
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E02, Sam accepts an offer from his friend, sportscaster Dave Richards.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E03, Carla and Eddie battle superstitions when they decide to get married.

programme.title: Little Carla, Happy At Last (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E04, Carla and Eddie dismiss the unfortunate events that occurred before the wedding as just bad luck.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Heavy Lift
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Heavy Lift, S04E08, New heavy lift rockets are taking to the sky. Falcon Heavy, SLS, Arianne 6 and Vega C rockets are primed to begin the next phase of space expansion.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: From There To Here
programme.desc: The New Frontier: From There To Here, S01E01, Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Fresh Eyes
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Fresh Eyes, S04E06, Two new space telescopes are in orbit and completing their shakedown; Gaia and TESS they too will be joined by the James Webb Telescope.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: Mercury Or Bust
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mercury Or Bust, S04E01, The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Hyabusa, S04E05, The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Atmosphere
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Atmosphere, S03E02, How do astronauts cope with living in space?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5015, Our cameras follow Detective Manny Reyes as he investigates the 1990 murder of a Fort Worth, Texas woman. Reyes talks to the woman's two sons, who believe that her husband, Bobby, was the murderer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Jungle Goddess

programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S03E18, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

Love Under the Stars, 20150816000000 +0000, When a 30-something woman living in an infinite state of youth is finally forced out into the real world, she befriends a young girl and a widower that will teach her that it is okay to grow up. Stars Ashley Newbrough.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.
I Do, I Do, I Do, 20150206000000 +0000, An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.

A Wish Come True, 20150131000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

The Lost Valentine, 20110130000000 +0000, Susan Allison, TV reporter, receives a sentimental news assignment: the story of Caroline Thomas, who has waited 60 years for her pilot husband; declared missing in action during World War II, to return to her.

A Place for Annie, 19940501000000 +0000, Sissy Spacek stars as a caring nurse who adopts an HIV positive baby but must fight prejudice and the natural mother who wants custody. Also stars Mary-Louise Parker and Joan Plowright. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Deals Undone
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Mick faces a failing business deal while Abby is subpoenaed.

programme.title: Exes Mark the Spot
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E09, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace seem finally ready to move forward.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E18, SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E01, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy , where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Rising (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E02, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E03, McKay (David Hewlett) volunteers to be the first to try Beckett's (Paul McGillion) newest ATA gene therapy. But things go wrong when the device cannot be removed, and is stopping Dr. McKay from being able to eat or drink and endangering his life.

programme.title: Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E04, The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E08, The team visit the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Coming Out, Getting Out, Going Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E24, Valerie puts the club up as collateral to bail Colin out of jail. Kelly comes home from rehab and Donna is put off by the frequent phone calls from a lonely Tara. Clare, Susan, Brandon and Steve organize a romantic evening for the Nat and Joan.

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E25, Rush dumps Ryan and Austin off on Steve on the same day that he is hosting a fraternity party. Kelly invites Tara to stay with her after she finishes her stint in rehab.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E26, Brandon, Steve, and Joe go on a camping trip with Susan, Clare, and Donna. The girls become jealous when the guys repeatedly ignore them to help some damsels in distress. Tara sabotages Kelly's relationship with Greg.

programme.title: Ticket To Ride
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E29, Colin tries to remain strong as he prepares to turn himself in and begin his prison term. Brandon and Susan lose a five-thousand-dollar lottery ticket, leading to a major argument.

programme.title: Ray Of Hope
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E30, Kelly agrees to help with the search for Colin when Brandon reveals that Nat could fall victim to the bail bondsman through his business ties to Valerie. Donna balks when she and David are asked to produce a music video for Ray.

programme.title: Remember The Alamo
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E01, Brandon and Steve run into a bit of trouble when their car breaks down. Donna works with David on a video shoot, and the singer isn't the only one that is hard to deal with.

programme.title: A Mate For Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E03, Joan's daughter Lily comes to town to serve as maid of honor, and seduces best man Brandon. David tries to get another video contract after being dropped by MZA. Valerie sees Kenny having lunch with his family.

programme.title: Disappearing Act
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E04, Kelly helps Jimmy treat a bleeding cut, and panics after getting some blood on her hand. David refuses to tell his father that he has dropped out of school. Brandon and Mark hire a confident young woman as their news anchor.

programme.title: Housewarming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E06, David and Mark throw a big party at their house. Clare catches Steve kissing another girl. Valerie comes clean with Brandon about her affair with Kenny.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E07, Kenny orders Valerie to terminate her pregnancy. Steve is miffed when Clare chooses to go to the Halloween concert with egotistical Dick Harrison. Brandon and Tracy spend time together at the club.

programme.title: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E08, Steve overhears Val discussing her pregnancy on the phone. David's grandfather leaves him $250,000 and a 1961 Thunderbird. An uncomfortable Tracy decides to quit her TV job after Brandon nixes a relationship.

programme.title: Loser Take All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E09, Brandon goes to see Kenny, who portrays himself as an innocent victim caught on the web of an evil vixen. Mel, worried by David's newfound wealth, asks Donna to keep an eye on him. Steve impresses Clare with his dedication as he trains for the crew race.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.
